Description_lang: Clears $s1% of your damage delayed with Stagger.$?s322510[Increases the absorption of your next Celestial Brew by up to $322510s1%, based on your current level of Stagger][]$?s383700[Instantly heals you for $383700s1% of the damage cleared.][]

description_blz.en_US: Clears 50% of your damage delayed with Stagger.
description_blz.es_MX: Elimina un 50% del daño demorado con Aplazar.
description_blz.pt_BR: Cancela 50% do dano adiado por Cambalear.
description_blz.de_DE: Entfernt bis zu 50% Eures mit 'Staffeln' verzögerten Schadens.
description_blz.en_GB: Clears 50% of your damage delayed with Stagger.
description_blz.es_ES: Elimina un 50% de tu daño aplazado con Aplazar.
description_blz.fr_FR: Annule 50% de vos dégâts différés par Report.
description_blz.it_IT: Purifica istantaneamente il 50% dei danni trascurati da Noncuranza.
description_blz.zh_TW: 清除50%醉仙緩勁所延後的傷害。
